name: XomBee
description:
First Person Zombie Shooter - The Goal : Survive 10 waves of 3 types of XomBees , each wave becomes increasingly difficult . Start with a Handgun and some Moltov's / Grenades survive the wave . Upgrade to Automatic rifles , Resupply Ammo and Healing available inbetween waves at the Ammo Locker . Working on free update with more Maps, Monsters , Weapons , Waves and better Spawn System ....Thanks for playing !

6/2/21 On an additional note this is a solo endeavor , a very rough first project but i have the upgrades almost ready to go .... I will also increase the waves and number spawned ... Thanks again for playing !
